question: When can I know the reception?
answer: We will keep in touch with you through email and our Facebook Group for updates! We ask of you to fill in the RSVP and INeedYourAddress form in the RSVP page.

question: Where is the reception?
answer: Kindly fill out the RSVP and INYA form to help us plan for the invitations!

question: What is the color theme?
answer: Here is a link of our color scheme: https://coolors.co/f5f5dc-f7b6b6-e6e6fa-97c1d8-ffe5b4 !

question: Why are you only registered on Zola?
answer: We found this platform through Hana's sister and it connects all of the shops such as Amazon, Target, etc. to avoid repeated orders.
